name: Slimy! Jump!
description:
Description

Just the Spacebar is enough for all the actions of this Slime Cube adventuring and endlessly going through obstacles.

Controls

Hold spacebar: Crouch

Release spacebar: Jump

Hold and release spacebar mid-air: Dash

Quickly tap spacebar mid-air: Ground Pound(ish)

- Wait, it's all spacebar? - Always has been

Credits
  • Juan C. Osorio A.
University of Applied Sciences Europe

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
